QuestData.Title: Wipe the Slate Clean
QuestData.Description:
At last, the skies belong to us once more... and in those skies, the storm of our vengeance brews.
Come, you who claim to be true Maldraxxi. You wish to right the wrongs of those you once called allies?
Rain your justice upon them! Show no quarter!
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Xandria and slay Maldraxxi.
